doc.title: In Love and War
doc.plot: When his B-24 bomber is shot from the sky over Yugoslavia, a young American navigator "Rockets" parachutes into one of the strangest love stories of World War II. Injured, he is guided to safety by an eccentric female Partisan "Maruska". During 40 days and nights, the unlikely pair suffer the pursuit of Nazi patrols, poisoned water wells, death-defying diarrhea, near constant inebriation and repeated deflowering of a questionable virgin who awards him with love, wisdom and crabs...
